desc.en:
The Pirate League was established hundreds of years ago around the time the Shrouded Isles were discovered a few groups of pirates set up raiding runs and operated out of various different bases, there uncoordinated ways led to multiple failures but they drew enough attention to the pirates that the King setup a Navy to combat them.

This act actually forced the pirates together and they formed the Pirate League, now all attacks are coordinated and sanctioned by the League and this has led to a much more stable pirate force.
